SVGAttributeHref.summary: The href attribute defines a link to a resource as a reference URL. The exact meaning of that link depends on the context of each element using it.

blockquote.para: Note: Specifications before SVG 2 defined an xlink:href attribute, which is now rendered obsolete by the href attribute. If you need to support earlier browser versions, the deprecated xlink:href attribute can be used as a fallback in addition to the href attribute, e.g. <use href="some-id" xlink:href="some-id" x="5" y="5" />.

remarks.para: You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:
